title:
What is the purpose of the
tag in HTML?

What is the purpose of the tag in HTML?
What is the difference between the <ol> and <ul> tags in HTML?
answer_1: <ol> creates an ordered list while <ul> creates an unordered list
answer_2: <ol> creates an unordered list while <ul> creates an ordered list
answer_3: <ol> is used for headings while <ul> is used for paragraphs
answer_4: <ol> is used for paragraphs while <ul> is used for headings
right_answer: <ol> creates an ordered list while <ul> creates an unordered list

title: What is the purpose of the <head> tag in HTML?
answer_1: To define the visible content of the web page
answer_2: To define the structure of the web page
answer_3: To define the metadata of the web page
answer_4: To define the layout of the web page
right_answer: To define the metadata of the web page

title: What is the purpose of the <table> tag in HTML?
answer_1: To add a video to a web page
answer_2: To add a form to a web page
answer_3: To add a table to a web page
answer_4: To add a heading to a web page
right_answer: To add a table to a web page

title: What is the purpose of the alt attribute in the tag in HTML?
answer_1: To add a caption to the image
answer_2: To define the alignment of the image
answer_3: To provide a text description of the image
answer_4: To define the width of the image
right_answer: To provide a text description of the image
